Three of the I18N roots for 'knee' are attested in cuneiform:  
[ğ’„­](ğ’„­.html) GAL Ğ³Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ° gola â²•â²â²— â²•â²‰â²—â²“ keli **knee** â€œKehleâ€ kuli koleno â€¢HEL á¸ªI ×›Ö¸Ö¼×¨Ö·×¢ kara â€¢karo ğ’„­ gwiwa @ Hausa â‡” [gon](gon.html)

[ğ’„­](ğ’„­.html) DUB topÃ¯q Ñ‚ÑƒĞ±Ñ‹Ò¡ tubÃ¯q knee â˜‘

Absurdly they also correspond to TOP, COOL and GOOD with the same meaning.  

This needs further investigation.
